text: nam or urai (atan timaiyin karanamaka) alikka natinal, atilulla (vacatiyana) cukavacikalai (nervaliyaip pinparri valumaru) nam evuvom; anal avarkalo (nam evalukku kattuppatamal) varampu miri natapparkal. Appotu, avvurin mitu, (vetanai parriya nam) vakku unmaiyaki vitukiratu - appal, nam atanai atiyotu alittu vitukirom
